Why use inquiry-based learning (IBL)?

  2. Blogging
  3. Oct 30, 2011

Amélie G. Schinck from Cal Poly San Luis Obispo has written a great piece titled Why use IBL?, which is posted over on The Academy of Inquiry-Based Learning.
